channel.title: A little problem if anyone can help me?

item.title: A little problem if anyone can help me?
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

I am getting a compile error, can you see what’s up with it please?

ERROR

client.java:5019: missing return statement } ^

I don’t know what I need to add.

This is the area of code that the compiler doesn’t seem to like.

public boolean HasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount) { int playerItemAmountCount = 0; for (int i=0; i<playerItems.length; i++) { if (playerItems[i] == itemID+1) { playerItemAmountCount = playerItemsN[i]; } if(playerItemAmountCount >= itemAmount){ return true;} } return false; }

If anyone can help me I would appreciate it loads, thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: A little problem if anyone can help me?
